Class Spawning

java.lang.Object
Spawning
public class Spawning extends Object
Class responsible for placing NPC's, weapons, and medkits on the map

      public Spawning()

  • Method Details

    • createMap

      public static List<List<String>> createMap(int size)
      Method used to create an empty map. First used in the console version of the program, the text implementation of the map stayed in our code as we were planning to write simulation's state after each turn to Data_collected.csv. This idea however did not come to fruition.
      The variable returned here is also used in spawning all elements of the simulation.
      Parameters:
      size - size of the simulation's board
      Returns:
      returns a List of Lists of Strings representing the simulation's empty map

    • updateMap

      public static List<List<String>> updateMap(int size, List<NPC> npcList, List<Weapon> weaponsList, List<int[]> medkitList)
      Method used to update the map with current positions of each element inside the simulation.
      Parameters:
      medkitList - List of medkits
      npcList - List of npc's
      weaponsList - list of weapon's
      size - size of the simulation's board
      Returns:
      returns a List of Lists of Strings representing the simulation's empty map

    • spawnNPCs

      public static List<NPC> spawnNPCs(int size, int NPCcount, List<List<String>> board, List<NPC> npcArray)
      Method used to choose the coordinates to spawn NPCs
      NOTE: this method purposefully prevents spawns on the edges of the board
      Parameters:
      size - size of simulation's board
      NPCcount - amount of NPC's to be spawned
      board - variable containing the string representation of the board
      npcArray - list of NPC's inside the simulation
      Returns:
      List of newly created NPC objects to be used inside the simulation

    • spawnRandomNPC

      public static List<NPC> spawnRandomNPC(int index, int posX, int posY, List<NPC> npcArray)
      Method used to create the objects of NPC subclasses.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the spawned NPC
      posX - X position of the spawned NPC
      posY - Y position of the spawned NPC
      npcArray - List of NPC's which the NPC will be added to.
      Returns:
      updated List of NPC's containing the new NPC.

    • spawnWeapons

      public static List<Weapon> spawnWeapons(List<List<String>> map, int size, int NPCcount, List<Weapon> weaponsArray)
      Method used to choose the coordinates for weapons to spawn and then create the objects of Weapons subclasses
      Parameters:
      map - string representation of the simulation's map
      size - size of simulation's board
      NPCcount - amount of NPC's present in the simulation
      weaponsArray - List of existing weapon objects
      Returns:
      updated List containing the newly spawned weapon

    • spawnMedkits

      public static List<int[]> spawnMedkits(List<List<String>> map, int size, int NPCcount, List<int[]> medpackList)
      Method used to spawn medkits in the simulation
      Parameters:
      map - string representation of the simulation's map
      size - size of simulation's board
      NPCcount - amount of NPC's present in the simulation
      medpackList - List of existing medkits
      Returns:
      updated List containing the newly spawned medkit
